channel.title: Music – Ziggy Alberts
channel.description: Recent content in Ziggy Alberts on Music

item.title: Ziggy Alberts - REWIND
item.description:
I want to make this sweeter baby
Can we make it personal?
Want to know you closer darling
Teach me as your hips sway slow
And I know you want this oasis dear
So when it’s cold out we’ll stay in here
Been cooking in the kitchen
and we got it on lock
Oven on 240 and a smoke alarm

Sing that song like the last time
Over and over
Don’t get it stuck in a rewind
Make love and write your poetry too ooo
See that girl like the first time
Over and over
Don’t get it stuck in a rewind
Fight for your rights
and write your poetry too ooo

I want to make this sweeter baby
Can we make it personal? Ooo
Want to learn your culture darling
Por que te amo você muito bom
(Eu nao falo)
You say you know and I don’t mind
And I say I’ve been caught in the tides
Take me to the bedroom
can we strip things down?
You know you’re the queen
and you don’t need no crown

Sing that song like the last time
Over and over
Don’t get it stuck in a rewind
Make love and write your poetry too ooo
See that girl like the first time
Over and over
Don’t get it stuck in a rewind
Fight for your rights
and write your poetry too ooo

Da da dmmm
Da da dmmm
Mm mmm
Mmm mm mm
